metadata.name: new_object_swf_4
metadata.description: Tests NEW_OBJECT opcode (0x40) - creates objects and arrays via constructor calls. Fully implements built-in constructors (Array, Object, Date, String, Number, Boolean), user-defined constructor support with 'this' binding, constructor return value handling, and basic prototype chain initialization. Tests array length property, element access, and object property operations.

edge_cases_tested: new Array(n) with single numeric argument
new Array(e1, e2, ...) with multiple elements
features_implemented: Built-in Array constructor with all three modes (empty, length, elements)
Built-in Date constructor with time property
Built-in String constructor with value property and type conversion
Built-in Number constructor with value property and type conversion
Built-in Boolean constructor with value property and boolean conversion
Constructor return value handling per ECMAScript spec
Proper reference counting for constructed objects
